Detailed Description

Contains routines to generate atmospheric turbulence screens.

Function Documentation

dmat* vonkarman_spect ( int  nx,
int  ny,
double  dx,
double  r0,
double  L0 
)

Create a vonkarman spectrum.

This is the square root of PSD. Good for rectangular screen. piston is in (0,0) 

00042                                                                       {
00043     if(nx & 1 || ny & 1){
00044     error("Screen is odd size.");
00045     }
00046 
00047     const double power=-11./12.;
00048     const double dfx=1./(nx*dx);
00049     const double dfy=1./(ny*dx);
00050     const double dfx2=dfx*dfx;
00051     const double L02=pow(L0,-2);
00052     const double scrnstr=sqrt(0.0229)*pow(r0,-5./6.)*(0.5e-6)/(2.*M_PI)*sqrt(dfx*dfy);
00053     const int nx2=nx/2;
00054     const int ny2=ny/2;
00055     dmat *spect=dnew(nx,ny);
00056     for(int i=0;i<ny;i++){
00057     double r2y=pow((i<ny2?i:i-ny)*dfy,2);// to avoid fft shifting.
00058     double *spect1=spect->p+i*nx;
00059     for(int j=0;j<nx2;j++){
00060         double r2x=j*j*dfx2;
00061         spect1[j] = pow(r2x+r2y+L02,power)*scrnstr;
00062     }
00063     for(int j=nx2;j<nx;j++){
00064         double r2x=(j-nx)*(j-nx)*dfx2;
00065         spect1[j] = pow(r2x+r2y+L02,power)*scrnstr;
00066     }
00067     }
00068     //spect->p[0]=0;//piston is in corner
00069     return spect;
00070 }

dmat* vonkarman_invpsd ( int  nx,
int  ny,
double  dx,
double  r0,
double  L0 
)

inverse of PSD.

zero frequency in lower left corner. 

00075                                                                        {
00076     dmat *psd=vonkarman_spect(nx, ny, dx, r0, L0);
00077     double scale=pow((double)(nx*ny),-2);
00078     for(long i=0; i<psd->nx*psd->ny; i++){
00079     psd->p[i]=pow(psd->p[i],-2)*scale;
00080     }
00081     return psd;
00082 }

MAP_T** genscreen_from_spect ( mt_state *  rstat,
dmat *  spect,
double  dx,
double *  wt,
int  nlayer,
int  nthread 
)

Generates multiple screens from spectrum. 

00141                                                        {
00142   
00143     GENSCREEN_T screendata;
00144     memset(&screendata, 0, sizeof(screendata));
00145     screendata.rstat=rstat;
00146     screendata.spect=spect;
00147     screendata.wt=wt;
00148     screendata.nlayer=nlayer;
00149     screendata.ilayer=0;
00150     PINIT(screendata.mutex_ilayer);
00151     spect->p[0]=0;//zero out piston.
00152     long m=spect->nx;
00153     long n=spect->ny;
00154     MAP_T** screen;
00155 
00156     screen=calloc(nlayer,sizeof(MAP_T*));
00157     screendata.screen=screen; 
00158     for(int ilayer=0; ilayer<nlayer; ilayer++){
00159     screen[ilayer]=calloc(1, sizeof(MAP_T));
00160     screen[ilayer]->nx=m;
00161     screen[ilayer]->ny=n;
00162     screen[ilayer]->ox=-m*dx/2;
00163     screen[ilayer]->oy=-n*dx/2;
00164     screen[ilayer]->dx=dx;
00165     }
00166 #if USE_POSIX_SHM == 1
00167     int use_shm=0;
00168     char fnshm[NAME_MAX];
00169     uint32_t key;
00170     long totmem;
00171     if(disable_atm_shm){
00172     use_shm=0;
00173     shm_free_unused("",0);
00174     }else{
00175     key=hashlittle(rstat, sizeof(struct_rand), 0);//contains seed
00176     key=hashlittle(spect->p, m*n*sizeof(double), key);
00177     key=hashlittle(wt, nlayer*sizeof(double), key);
00178     snprintf(fnshm,NAME_MAX,"/maos_atm_%ud_%d_%ld_%g",key,nlayer,m,dx);
00179     long already_exist = shm_free_unused(fnshm, 0);
00180     totmem=(m*n*nlayer+1)*sizeof(double);//+1 for sanity check.
00181     long shm_avail=shm_get_avail();
00182     if(!already_exist && shm_avail<totmem*1.1){
00183         warning2("Need %ld MiB, only %ld MiB available", totmem/1024/1024, shm_avail/1024/1024);
00184         warning2("Fall back to non-shared atm");
00185         use_shm=0;
00186     }else{
00187         use_shm=1;
00188     }
00189     }
00190     if(use_shm){
00191     int fd;
00192     retry:
00193     //sleep so that the creation process has enough time to make an exclusive lock.
00194     fd=shm_open(fnshm, O_RDONLY, 00777); usleep(100);//umask'ed
00195 
00196     if(fd<0){//unable to open. We then try to create
00197         fd=shm_open(fnshm, O_RDWR|O_CREAT|O_EXCL, 00777);
00198         if(fd<0){//some other process created it in the mean time
00199         fd=shm_open(fnshm, O_RDONLY, 00777); usleep(100);
00200         if(fd<0){
00201             error("Unable to open shared segment for read.\n");
00202         }else{
00203             if(flock(fd, LOCK_SH)){//wait to make a shared lock
00204             error("Failed to apply a lock on shared segment.\n");
00205             }   
00206         }
00207         }else{
00208         info2("\nCreating %s ...",fnshm);
00209         /*apply an exclusive lock so no other process can make a shared
00210           lock thus preventing them from reading the data.*/
00211         if(flock(fd, LOCK_EX)){
00212             error("Failed to apply an exclusive lock");
00213         }
00214         if(ftruncate(fd, totmem)){//allocate the size.
00215             perror("ftruncate");
00216             error("Failed to allocate memory. check kernel.shmmax in /etc/sysctl.conf");
00217         }
00218         fchmod(fd, 00777);//make it globally writable. (not working as what I wanted)
00219         if((screen[0]->p=mmap(NULL, totmem, PROT_READ|PROT_WRITE, MAP_SHARED ,fd, 0))<0){
00220             error("Unable to mmap for read/write\n");
00221         }
00222         screen[0]->shm=fd;//use the file descriptor so we can release the lock.
00223         for(int ilayer=1; ilayer<nlayer; ilayer++){
00224             screen[ilayer]->shm = -1;
00225             screen[ilayer]->p   = screen[0]->p+m*n*ilayer;
00226         }
00227         screen[0]->p[m*n*nlayer]=0;//say the data is not valid.
00228         CALL(genscreen_do, &screendata, nthread);
00229         screen[0]->p[m*n*nlayer]=1;//say the data is valid.
00230         if(munmap(screen[0]->p, totmem)){//unmap read/write. remap as read only later
00231             error("munmap failed\n");
00232         }
00233         flock(fd, LOCK_UN);//release exclusive lock.
00234         if(close(fd)){//close file descriptor
00235             warning("Error closing %d\n",fd);
00236         }
00237         //Reopen as read only and do shared lock.
00238         if((fd=shm_open(fnshm, O_RDONLY, 00777))<0){
00239             error("Failed to open shared segment.\n");
00240         }
00241         }
00242     }else{
00243         info2("\nReusing %s ...",fnshm);
00244     }
00245     futimes(fd, NULL);//set access, modification time to current.
00246     if(flock(fd, LOCK_SH)){
00247         error("Failed to apply a shared lock on shared segment.\n");
00248     }
00249     //we map it in read only mode.
00250     screen[0]->p=mmap(NULL, totmem, PROT_READ, MAP_SHARED, fd, 0);
00251     if(fabs(screen[0]->p[m*n*nlayer])<1.e-15){
00252         warning2("Data in shm %s is invalid, free and redo it.\n", fnshm);
00253         flock(fd, LOCK_UN);//release lock.
00254         close(fd);//close descriptor.
00255         if(munmap(screen[0]->p, totmem)){//unmap.
00256         error("munmap failed\n");
00257         }
00258         shm_unlink(fnshm);//destroy the map.
00259         goto retry;
00260     }
00261     if(screen[0]->p<0){
00262         error("Unable to mmap for read/write\n");
00263     }
00264     screen[0]->shm=fd;//save file descriptor of shared mem for easy munmap later and close fd
00265     for(int ilayer=1; ilayer<nlayer; ilayer++){
00266         screen[ilayer]->shm = -1;//say this is a part of the shared mem
00267         screen[ilayer]->p = screen[0]->p+m*n*ilayer;
00268     }  
00269     /*In the end, a shared lock is placed on the shm
00270       memory. if the screen is freed or program exited, the
00271       shared lock will be released. THis is the method I
00272       invented to tell how many process is using this shm.*/
00273     }else{
00274 #endif
00275     for(int ilayer=0; ilayer<nlayer; ilayer++){
00276         screen[ilayer]->p=malloc(m*n*sizeof(double));
00277         screen[ilayer]->shm=0;
00278     }
00279     CALL(genscreen_do, &screendata, nthread);
00280 #if USE_POSIX_SHM == 1
00281     }
00282 #endif
00283     return screen;
00284 }

MAP_T** vonkarman_screen ( mt_state *  rstat,
int  m,
int  n,
double  dx,
double  r0,
double  L0,
double *  wt,
int  nlayer,
int  nthread 
)

Generate vonkarman screens from turbulence statistics. 

00289                                                                          {
00290    
00291     char fnspect[PATH_MAX];
00292     dmat *spect;
00293     mymkdir("%s/.aos/spect/",getenv("HOME"));
00294     snprintf(fnspect,PATH_MAX,"%s/.aos/spect/spect_%dx%d_dx1_%g_r0%g_L0%g.bin",
00295          getenv("HOME"),m,n,1./dx,r0,L0);
00296     if(exist(fnspect)){
00297     spect=({char fn[PATH_MAX];strcpy(fn,fnspect);dread("%s",fn);});
00298     }else{
00299     info2("\nGenerating spect...");
00300     TIC;
00301     tic;
00302     spect=vonkarman_spect(m,n,dx,r0,L0);
00303     toc2("done");
00304     dwrite(spect,"%s",fnspect);
00305     }
00306     MAP_T **screen=genscreen_from_spect(rstat,spect,dx,wt,nlayer,nthread);
00307     dfree(spect);
00308     return(screen);
00309 }

) [static]

Create a vonkarman spectrum.

This is the square root of PSD. Good for rectangular screen. piston is in (0,0) 

00315                                                                               {
00316   
00317     if(nx & 1 || ny & 1){
00318     error("Screen is odd size.");
00319     }
00320 
00321     const double power=-1.;
00322     const double dfx=1./(nx*dx);
00323     const double dfy=1./(ny*dx);
00324     const double dfx2=dfx*dfx;
00325     const double L02=pow(L0,-2);
00326     const double scrnstr=sqrt(0.0229)*pow(r0,-5./6.)*(0.5e-6)/(2.*M_PI)*sqrt(dfx*dfy);
00327     const int nx2=nx/2;
00328     const int ny2=ny/2;
00329     dmat *spect=dnew(nx,ny);
00330     for(int i=0;i<ny;i++){
00331     double r2y=pow((i<ny2?i:i-ny)*dfy,2);// to avoid fft shifting.
00332     double *spect1=spect->p+i*nx;
00333     for(int j=0;j<nx2;j++){

00336     }
00337     for(int j=nx2;j<nx;j++){
00338         double r2x=(j-nx)*(j-nx)*dfx2;
00339         spect1[j] = pow(r2x+r2y+L02,power)*scrnstr;
00340     }
00341     }
00342     //spect->p[0]=0;//piston is in corner
00343     return spect;
00344 }
